lines.text: The Geneva Convention is merely a tool of decadent capitalism, comrade.

[responding to a torturer's demand for military information]
Peter Reilly, lieutenant, OC796032.

[to Lt. Peter Reilly]
Confess to germ warfare or you'll never see your wife again.
Every man has his breaking point.
Where does your family live now?
In Hollywood with my brothers Clark Gable and Spencer Tracy and my sisters Esther Williams and Janey Powell.
